mapper.select:
SELECT sche.sch_id, sche.user_id, (select user_name from just_user ju1 where ju1.user_id = sche.user_id) as user_name, sche.sch_day, sche.sch_time, sche.sch_wrt_user_id, (select user_name from just_user ju2 where ju2.user_id = sche.sch_wrt_user_id) as sch_wrt_user_name, sche.sch_status_code, (select code_name from just_code co1 where co1.code_id = sche.sch_status_code) as sch_status_code_name, prog.prog_id, prog.prog_name, prog.prog_type, (select code_name from just_code where code_id = prog.prog_type) as prog_type_name, prog.prog_trainer, (select user_name from just_user ju3 where ju3.user_id = prog.prog_trainer) as prog_trainer_name, prog.prog_remark FROM just_schedule sche, just_program prog WHERE sche.prog_id = prog.prog_id(+) AND sche.user_id = #{user_id} AND sche.sche_del_yn = 'N' AND prog.prog_del_yn = 'N'
AND TO_DATE(sche.SCH_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{sch_day},'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY SCH_DAY, SCH_TIME ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JUST_SCHEDULE( SCH_ID USER_ID SCH_DAY SCH_TIME PROG_ID SCH_WRT_USER_ID SCH_STATUS_CODE ) VALUES( to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss')|| LPAD((SELECT COUNT(SCH_ID) FROM JUST_SCHEDULE WHERE SCH_ID like to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss')||'%' ),3,'0'), #{user_id}, #{sch_day}, #{sch_time}, #{prog_id}, #{sch_wrt_user_id}, #{sch_status_code} )
